name: Train Trouble in Cog Valley
description:
A cute little tower defense with a train track twist.  Loop on a track as you plow through nefarious Cog warriors hellbent on destroying the only human refuge left.

Created for Ludum Dare by Beatrix  and Nathan, to the theme of Stuck in a Loop.

If you like please rate us over on the LudamDare game jam site: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/train-trouble-in-cog-valley

The V2 is a reupload, the first version is not balanced, so we used the Ludum Dare Submission hour to balance and increase some difficulty.
